help.general:
📋 *News Approval Bot Help*

This bot allows you to submit news for review and approval.

Available commands:
• /start - Start the bot
• /help - Show this help message
• /language - Change language
help.admin_note:
*Admin Commands:*
• News sent to you will have approval options
help.submit_instructions:
To submit news:
1. Send text or media
2. Make sure to include a description
3. Confirm submission when prompted

messages.news_unavailable: This news item is no longer available.
messages.news_already_processed: This news was already {status} by admin @{admin_name}

sections.user:
📱 *User Guide*

To submit news:
1. Start a conversation with the bot
2. Send your text (required)
3. You can also attach photos or videos
4. Click Submit when prompted
5. Admins will review your submission

Use /language to change the interface language.
sections.admin:
👨‍💼 *Admin Guide*

As an admin, you can:
1. Receive news submissions from users
2. Approve or reject submissions

Use /language to change the interface language.
